caption.p: Changes in weight loss of leaf essential oil microcapsules during the dry-heat aging period. β-CD: β-cyclodextrin; LL oil: C. osmophloeum leaf oil; β-CD/LL oil: leaf oil microcapsules; different letters (a–e) in the figure refer to the statistically significant difference at the level of p < 0.05 according to the Scheffé’s test.
